snippet: Over three days visiting military bases across the southeastern United States this week, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel told everyone that compromise in Washington was unlikely.
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel spends three days visiting military bases of all four armed services across southeastern United States; discusses furlough concerns with personnel, but acknowledges grim financial forecast, saying budget compromise in Washington is unlikely.
lead_paragraph: Over three days visiting military bases across the southeastern United States this week, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel told everyone that compromise in Washington was unlikely.

headline.main: Discussing Furlough Concerns at Military Bases, Hagel Has ‘No Good News’
headline.print_headline: Discussing Furlough Concerns at Military Bases, Hagel Has ‘No Good News’

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
